description: From the participle stem of Latin deflagrare, from de + flagrare (“to burn”).

verbs.description: deflagrate (third-person singular simple present deflagrates, present participle deflagrating, simple past and past participle deflagrated)

definitionGroups.group: (physics) To burn with intense light and heat.

entries.meaning: Specifically, to combust subsonically through thermal conduction.
